overview:
Saif is a qualified UAE advocate with over two decades of experience in litigation, real estate and dispute resolution throughout the GCC. Saif has handled some of the landmark litigation matters in the region and holds extensive dispute resolution experience in the Middle East, including acting on international arbitrations before the ICC, LCIA and DIAC.

He assumes personal responsibility for directing the investigation and development of client cases; is involved in all our firm’s litigation and uses his vast experience to negotiate most of our settlements. Saif has been successful in representing numerous cases before Dubai Courts and other courts in GCC to verdict and settled thousands of claims for clients. Saif is a regular feature in UAE’s media circles and shares his opinions in both - English as well as Arabic media, covering Middle East regulations.
